builds.name: Standard
builds.description: A Main DPS that revolves around dodge attacks with her 5th advancement, becoming a relying source of the grievous debuff.

builds.name: Standard
builds.description: A high skill ceiling unit that relies on crit and excels at executing targets below 60% HP.

builds.name: Standard
builds.description: A solid shieldbreaking unit with the third highest shatter stat currently in the game.

builds.name: Standard
builds.description: A free to play friendly tank with a reliable taunt and a powerful dodge attack when paired with the Huma matrix set.

builds.name: Standard
builds.description: A Main DPS unit that wants to stack normal attack damage via advancements and matrices.

builds.name: Standard
builds.description: A defensive unit that fills the tank role well thanks to her constant CC and damage reduction.

builds.name: Standard
builds.description: The best shieldbreaking unit with the highest shatter stat currently in the game.

builds.description: The best shieldbreaking defense unit with the second highest shatter stat currently in the game.

builds.name: Standard
builds.description: A staple in any volt team thanks to her Volt Resonance, Nemesis functions as a Sub DPS with access powerful healing with her Dodge.

builds.name: Standard
builds.description: A healer who relies on her first advancement for reliable heals, due to her long cooldown skill.

builds.name: Standard
builds.description: Safe and reliable aerial damage dealer.

builds.name: Standard
builds.description: A Sub DPS with great AOE capabilities thanks to her bouncing chakrams. She gets very powerful team-wide skill cooldown reset at her 3rd advancement.

builds.name: Standard
builds.description: An engaging ranged Main DPS that revolves around keeping a series of damage buffs active, including one via her dodge attacks with her 1st advancement.

builds.name: Standard
builds.description: A defense unit that focuses on shielding and healing his team, which gets much stronger with his 3rd advancement. He excels in group play where he can provide an AOE damage immunity buff (discharge) and damage increase buff (matrices).
